name: Better Homes and Gardens 14" Melamine Serving Platter, Red Damask

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens 14" Melamine Serving Platter, Red Damask
reviews.reviewText: We bought this set for use in our outdoor patio. They're very pretty, lightweight, and durable. A super choice for this use!
reviews.title: Lightweight and attractive

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens 14" Melamine Serving Platter, Red Damask
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the colors of this platter. I worried when I ordered online that it might not be as beautiful as it was in the picture, but the colors are bright and vibrant. I also ordered the dinner plates and the serving platter. I love them all! Now if I could only find matching bowls...
reviews.title: Bright and beautiful

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens 14" Melamine Serving Platter, Red Damask
reviews.reviewText: We do a lot of outdoor entertaining and I hate using paper and plastic when it's family or under 20pp. I love the sophistication of this set yet it is lightweight and easy to carry in and stack in my dishwasher from the outside deck. I also don't worry about them breaking and shattering where my kids go barefoot all summer. Pleasantly surprised!
reviews.title: Very happy!
